A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's basically shiny garbage with amateur writing\, gaping plot holes\, pointless shallow characters and sub plots and ridiculous decisions made by someone who I assume has never actually watched any previous film in the series. 

Its a bad star wars movie\, but it's also just a bad movie. I have literally no idea what the critics were thinking in rating it so highly.

....... And it still can't help but be derivative of empire strikes back. Write something new and complimentary for gawds sake!

I didn't hate the Porgs though and there were a few good ideas\, Mark Hamil in particular tried his best to make it better so this one star belongs to them.
